ingredients: 1/2 cup (1 stick) chilled unsalted butter, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 large egg yolk beaten to blend with 3 tablespoons cold water
3 tablespoons chilled unsalted butter, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 1/2 pounds plums (about 5 large), halved, pitted, cut into 1/2-inch-thick wedges
1 large egg beaten with 2 teaspoons water (for glaze)
